EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2018.SG No Show
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry to miss you at SpringOne Tour 2018 in Singapore
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
We were sorry that you missed the SpringOne Tour held at Grand Hyatt Singapore on 12 November 2018!
Please view the event highlights and we hope you can join us at the Singapore leg of SpringOne Platform 2019.
Key Highlights: - Attendees: Our attendees include Developers, Architects, Software Engineers and CTOs who gathered to exchange ideas and network. - Sponsors: Our distinguished sponsors Dynatrace, Solace, JP Morgan and Synopsys showcase their latest product knowledge and upcoming trends about the industry. - Speakers: 8 established speakers from Pivotal shared about topics relevant to Spring. The event kick started with a presentation on 'Reactive Spring with Spring Boot 2.0' and culminated with a keynote on 'Using Spinnaker to Create a Development Workflow on Kubernetes'. - Download presentation slides here <[[https://www.ekkko.com/smart/hello/Load?EventID=k580qhhw&Pg=presentation]]> - Photos <[[https://www.ekkko.com/smart/hello/Load?EventID=k580qhhw&Pg=photos]]>: Our attendees had the opportunity to visit booth showcases, snap a photo at our photo-wall & connect with peers at our cocktail after-party.
Email us at jchew@pivotal.io <[[mailto:jchew@pivotal.io]]> if you have any feedback or enquiries.
We look forward to seeing you at our next event!
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
